message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you this fantastic product. I believe it would be highly valuable to you.  I'm initially thinking of a price around $20,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents the value I believe it brings, I'm willing to negotiate.  How about we meet at $17,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, $17,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $14,000 for the product. Can we meet in the middle at $15,000?
